name: sonarqube
description: SonarQube is a code quality and security analysis platform. It scans codebases for bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells, presenting dashboards, trends, and gating rules for CI pipelines.
features: Code quality analysis: Scans code for bugs, vulnerabilities, and code smells.
Security scanning: Detects security vulnerabilities and injection flaws.
Multi-language support: Analyzes 30+ programming languages including Java, C#, Python, and JavaScript.
Quality gates: Enforces quality standards by blocking builds that don't meet criteria.
Technical debt tracking: Calculates and visualizes technical debt across projects.
Code coverage: Integrates with test coverage tools to track test completeness.
Duplicate detection: Identifies duplicated code blocks for refactoring opportunities.
CI/CD integration: Connects with Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, and other pipelines.
Historical trends: Displays code quality evolution over time with charts.
Pull request decoration: Comments on PRs with quality issues and metrics.
Custom rules: Creates organization-specific quality rules and profiles.
Portfolio management: Organizes and compares quality across multiple projects.
